The tourist attractions used to include hashish warehouses, a bazaar specialising in weapons, and weapons factories where children with files made things such as breech blocks by hand.

Landi Kotal is famous for smuggling. Hashish, weapons and consumer electronics are the specialties,
but if you are suicidally brave and haggle well, you could probably buy or sell almost anything.
